glacier-client.name: Glacier Client
glacier-client.author: Pepe
glacier-client.description: Glacier Client is an all-in-one PVP client for Minecraft Bedrock Edition. It features a custom user interface, a wide range of utility mods, and a sleek, modern design.

project-light.name: Project Light
project-light.author: Indigo
project-light.description: Project Light is a lightweight client focusing on performance and a minimalist aesthetic. It's perfect for players who want a clean experience without a lot of clutter.

crystal-hacks.name: Crystal Hacks
crystal-hacks.author: Unknown
crystal-hacks.description: Crystal Hacks is a utility mod client known for its extensive features and powerful customization. It's designed for advanced players who want complete control over their gameplay.

better-bedrock.name: Better Bedrock
better-bedrock.author: The Better Bedrock Team
better-bedrock.description: Enhances the vanilla experience with quality-of-life features.

luconia.name: Luconia
luconia.author: Luconia Devs
luconia.description: A feature-rich PVP client with a focus on competitive play.

utility-ui.name: Utility UI
utility-ui.author: Unknown
utility-ui.description: A modular user interface designed for utility mods.

utility-hud.name: Utility HUD
utility-hud.author: Unknown
utility-hud.description: Customizable heads-up display with essential information.

evoker-ui.name: Evoker UI
evoker-ui.author: Avaritia
evoker-ui.description: A clean and intuitive user interface with a sleek design.

some-other-client.name: Some Other Client
some-other-client.author: Anonymous
some-other-client.description: Another great client for Minecraft Bedrock.

another-client.name: Another Client
another-client.author: Anonymous
another-client.description: A very basic client to fill up the list.
